title: 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Home
posting_body: Property located in quiet Hillside neighborhood of Daly City near San Bruno Mountain and County Park.
Traditional tunnel entry, 3 bedroom 2 bath, living room w/fireplace, updated kitchen with new appliances with a small nook and separate dining area.
Huge bonus room downstairs with a separate storage room, small functioning bathroom with shower.
Accessible from entrance or via garage, upstairs or back door from the backyard.
Tenants responsible for all utilities and upkeep of backyard/front yard.
Nearby schools: Susan B Anthony Elementary K-5, Thomas R. Pollicita Middle School 6-8, Jefferson High School 9-12
Near BART and bus route Samtrans 130

Move in requirements: Current ID/Passport, 3 most current pay stubs, 2 mos bank statements, bring current credit/background check or $45 non-refundable fee to run credit/background check, rental application and references.
Inquiries: TEXT or email  and by appointment only.
